Package game.actions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IActionGenerator
    An IActionGenerator determines which ActionSet should be assigned to nodes as potential child nodes to explore.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Contains the keypresses and durations for a single action.
    ActionGenerator_FixedActions
    ActionGenerator which is defined for a single ActionSet which is always returned when queried.
    ActionGenerator_FixedSequence
    Assigns potential action choices to nodes.
    ActionGenerator_Uniform
    Gives the same choice of game.actions at every node, with the exception that a new Node must not be given the same key combination options as its parent (i.e.
    ActionQueue
    All things related to storing and going through sequences of game.actions.
    ActionSet
    An ActionSet acts like an ArrayList for game.actions, except it allows for sampling from the list on a Distribution.
